meanings.definition: A monosaccharide containing three carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The trisaccharide is made up of three triooses.
meanings.sent2: Glucose is an example of a trisaccharide that contains triose.
meanings.sent3: The trio of triooses danced together in the sugar molecule.
meanings.sent4: The trio of triooses worked harmoniously to provide energy to the cell.
meanings.sent5: The trio of triooses formed a tight-knit group, ensuring efficient metabolism.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of three-carbon sugars.
meanings.sent1: Fructose is a common triose found in fruits.
meanings.sent2: Plants produce triose during photosynthesis for energy.
meanings.sent3: The trio of triooses in the plant happily soaked up the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The trio of triooses in the plant stood strong like pillars supporting growth.
meanings.sent5: The trio of triooses in the plant hummed with sweetness, fueling growth and development.
